meanings.sent1: She was boohooing loudly after losing her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The baby started boohooing when her ice cream fell on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The puppy kept boohooing until it got a belly rub.
meanings.sent4: The storm outside sounded like the whole world was boohooing.
meanings.sent5: His boohooing echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: The act of crying noisily or uncontrollably.
meanings.sent1: The boohooing from the next room woke me up.
meanings.sent2: Her boohooing could be heard from across the playground.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so sad that it caused a lot of boohooing in the theater.
meanings.sent4: The sound of boohooing filled the air during the sad scene.
meanings.sent5: The boohooing continued long after the sad news was shared.
